statements.select: select count(*) from ReagentNeedleAntifoulingStrategyTb where ReagentNeedle=#ReagentNeedle# and PolluteSourcePro=#PolluteSourcePro# and PolluteProType=#PolluteProType# BePollutedPro=#BePollutedPro# and BePollutedProType=#BePollutedProType#
statements.update: update ReagentNeedleAntifoulingStrategyTb set ReagentNeedle=#ReagentNeedle# , PolluteSourcePro=#PolluteSourcePro#, PolluteProType=#PolluteProType#, BePollutedPro=#BePollutedPro#, BePollutedProType=#BePollutedProType#, CleaningLiquidName=#CleaningLiquidName#, CleaningLiquidUseVol=#CleaningLiquidUseVol#, CleanTimes=#CleanTimes# where ReagentNeedle=#ReagentNeedleOld# and PolluteSourcePro=#PolluteSourceProOld# and PolluteProType=#PolluteProTypeOld# and BePollutedPro=#BePollutedProOld# and BePollutedProType=#BePollutedProTypeOld#
statements.delete: delete from ReagentNeedleAntifoulingStrategyTb where ReagentNeedle=#ReagentNeedle# and PolluteSourcePro=#PolluteSourcePro# and PolluteProType=#PolluteProType# and BePollutedPro=#BePollutedPro# and BePollutedProType=#BePollutedProType#
statements.select: select ReagentName from reagentsettingstb where ReagentType='清洗液'
